metadata.title: CVE-2022-1253 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository strukturag/libde265 priorto and including 1.0.8. The fix is established in commit8e89fe0e175d2870c39486fdd09250b230ec10b8 but does not yet belong to anofficial release.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
